org.modelio.api.module.commands

Interface IModuleAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultModuleAction

    public interface IModuleAction
    Interface defining an Action or Command provided by a module.

    Usually to be used either in contextual menus or in the toolbar of the property view.
